citations.narrative:
A written exercise plan for dogs was not available for review. The facility houses dogs in groups or individually and the
enclosures provide adequate floor space to meet exercise requirements.
Failure to provide a written exercise plan may result in lack of sufficient exercise to maintain physical health and well-
being of the dogs.
Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan, approved by the attending veterinarian, to provide dogs
with the opportunity for exercise and the plan must be available to APHIS upon request.
Correct by: April 1, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.8 
   
Exercise for dogs. 
A written exercise plan for dogs was not available for review. The facility houses dogs in groups or individually and the 
enclosures provide adequate floor space to meet exercise requirements. 
Failure to provide a written exercise plan may result in lack of sufficient exercise to maintain physical health and well-
being of the dogs. 
Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan, approved by the attending veterinarian, to provide dogs 
with the opportunity for exercise and the plan must be available to APHIS upon request. 
Correct by: April 1, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
